title: Coromon
notes: Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Adventure, Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Indie, Puzzle, Fighting
description: Coromon is a modern monster taming game with retro pixelart. Coromon brings an immersive storyline, strategic turn-based combat and challenging puzzles to a classic genre.
